help: Metadata field to XMP tag mapping.
This file defines which XMP tags are used for metadata fields in the archive.
Each key is a field name used in config.json languages section.
Each value is the corresponding XMP tag name that will be written to image files.
- description: General description of the image/archive
- source: Physical location or source of the original item
- description, rights, terms: Support language variants (LangAlt tags)
- creator, credit, source: Do NOT support language variants
(exiftool will write only the default language and warn about variants)
2. Add the field to your languages in config.json
3. The field will automatically be written to images with language variants
If this file is missing, the following defaults are used:
creator: XMP-dc:Creator
